name: How constituted
text:
PART I.  SUPREME COURT

     The supreme court, pursuant to section 2 of Article VI of the Constitution, shall consist of a chief justice and four associate justices. [L 1892, c 57, §49; am L 1903, c 32, §13; RL 1925, §2221; RL 1935, §3590; RL 1945, §9601; RL 1955, §214-1; am L Sp 1959 1st, c 5, §2(a); HRS ; ree L 1979, c 111, pt of §2]
